room_title: Escape room "Checkmate" by No Escape in Ithaca
room_description:
Dr. Williams died in this house from apparent natural causes. However, their ghost still haunts the room. In an effort to stop the haunting, equipment has been installed to bring the room slightly out of phase with our reality and facilitate a connection with the spirit.
Once activated, you'll have 90 minutes to figure out why this spirit still lingers, hopefully allowing it to find peace... and allowing you to escape...
